name: ReserveInitialized (Lending Aave)
signature: ReserveInitialized(address indexed asset, address indexed aToken, address stableDebtToken, address variableDebtToken, address interestRateStrategyAddress)

name: Transfer (ERC20) (generic)
signature: Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 value)

name: Transfer (ERC721) (generic)
signature: Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 indexed tokenId)

name: ReserveFactorChanged (Lending Aave)
signature: ReserveFactorChanged(address indexed asset, uint256 oldReserveFactor, uint256 newReserveFactor)

name: ReserveDataUpdated (Lending Aave)
signature: ReserveDataUpdated(address indexed reserve, uint256 liquidityRate, uint256 stableBorrowRate, uint256 variableBorrowRate, uint256 liquidityIndex, uint256 variableBorrowIndex)

name: ReserveFactorChanged (Lending Aave)
signature: ReserveFactorChanged(address indexed asset, uint256 oldReserveFactor, uint256 newReserveFactor)

name: DecreaseLiquidity (DEX V3)
signature: DecreaseLiquidity(uint256 indexed tokenId, uint128 liquidity, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)

name: IncreaseLiquidity (DEX V3)
signature: IncreaseLiquidity(uint256 indexed tokenId, uint128 liquidity, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)

name: Mint (DEX v3)
signature: Mint(address owner, int24 tickLower, int24 tickUpper, uint128 amount, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)

name: Burn (DEX v3)
signature: Burn(address owner, int24 tickLower, int24 tickUpper, uint128 amount, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)

name: Swap (DEX v3)
signature: Swap(address sender, address recipient, int256 amount0, int256 amount1, uint160 sqrtPriceX96, uint128 liquidity, int24 tick)

name: PairCreated (DEX v2)
signature: PairCreated(address indexed token0, address indexed token1, address pair, uint256)

name: Mint (DEX v2)
signature: Mint(address indexed sender, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1)

name: Burn (DEX v2)
signature: Burn(address indexed sender, uint256 amount0, uint256 amount1, address indexed to)

name: Swap (DEX v2)
signature: Swap(address indexed sender, uint256 amount0In, uint256 amount1In, uint256 amount0Out, uint256 amount1Out, address indexed to)
